responses.rationale: The segment describes the location of cases, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes a past confirmation of cases, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes the scope of cases based on data, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes the cause of spread, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes the impact (infections and culling), not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes the cumulative impact (culling numbers), not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes the impact specific to Iowa (culling numbers), not capability or preparedness.
The segment provides context about industry size, not capability or preparedness.
The segment provides context about industry size, not capability or preparedness.
